Package views.interfaces

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OnDominoClickListener
    When the Player click on a Domino.
    OnGameModeClickListener
    When a GameMode button is clicked.
    OnPlayerColorClickListener
    When a Player chose his PlayerColor.
    OnPlayerNumberClickListener
    When a button with the number of Players for the Game is clicked.
    OnPossibilityClickListener
    When a Player click on a Positions possibility for his Domino to be placed.
